name: heaven and hell
description:
This is a tense and thrilling escape game with a modern ugly and cute texture style that makes people cannot move their eyes away.
The little white rabbit was chased by the big gray wolf and eventually came to a small path on the river.
The road ahead is bumpy, with sturdy stones for you to jump and stand on, but floating wood and stones, turtles and crocodiles are also lurking on the road.
Press the A key to jump one space, and press the D key to jump two spaces. Reasonable use of your jumping skills can help you go further without being chased by the big gray wolf.
The speed of running is getting faster and faster, pay attention to the reasonable use of skills, and never jump to blank spaces or stay on floating trees or crocodiles for too long, otherwise the escape mission will also fail.
Hurry up and call on your friends to give it a try, and see if you can help the little white rabbit escape and ascend in the end!
